# setNeedsDropPreviewUpdate()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the operating system that an updated drop preview is available for the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setNeedsDropPreviewUpdate()
```

## Discussion

Call this method to provide an updated drop preview after UIKit has started the drop animation. If the drop animation is still ongoing, UIKit calls the drop interaction delegate’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropInteractionDelegate/dropInteraction(_:previewForDropping:withDefault:)] method, passing the previous drop preview as the `defaultPreview`.

## Changing the drag item preview

- **previewProvider**: A visual preview of the drag item, displayed while the user drags the item across the screen.
